root.name: Histogram Equalization
root.description:
Enhances the global contrast by equalizing the histogram.
This plugin transforms pixel intensities so that they are uniformly distributed over the gray-scale range. It operates on the selected channel of each image of a sequence.
This operation is also called "histogram flattening".
